topic: From Policing to Designing: Authentic Assessment in the GenAI Era
target_audience: assessment designers, program directors, quality assurance teams

refs.content: Decision flows for adapting assessment: allow use with acknowledgement, assess process, stress human intelligence, align outcomes.
HEPI/Kortext survey prompts UK universities to stress-test assessments and staff training as AI use surges.
Australian regulator advises shifting toward secure/authentic assessments; warns against overreliance on detectors.

special_instructions: Offer redesign patterns (studio critiques, oral defenses, lab practicals, live code), workload estimates, and student comms templates.
